<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string snakeCase;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> check = &#91;&amp;input&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;bool(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)&gt; predicate) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j &lt; input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() &amp;&amp; predicate(input&#91;j&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>(); ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    snakeCase.push&#95;back(tolower(input&#91;i&#93;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handles &quot;runs&quot; of capitals, such as in OPName -&gt; op&#95;name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (check(i, isupper) &amp;&amp; check(i + 1, isupper) &amp;&amp; check(i + 2, islower))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">      snakeCase.push&#95;back(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;&#95;&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((check(i, islower) || check(i, isdigit)) &amp;&amp; check(i + 1, isupper))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      snakeCase.push&#95;back(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;&#95;&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> snakeCase;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba9c7a61ab2767e77f9ada22f54441c0"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba9c7a61ab2767e77f9ada22f54441c0">llvm::convertToCamelFromSnakeCase</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> input,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> capitalizeFirst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string output;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  output.reserve(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push the first character, capatilizing if necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (capitalizeFirst &amp;&amp; std::islower(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a61364ca3a5ff90fb2aa0d5a371fd43f7">front</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    output.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadcb10384f6f67a800d81e4312cabc46">llvm::toUpper</a>(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a61364ca3a5ff90fb2aa0d5a371fd43f7">front</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    output.push&#95;back(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a61364ca3a5ff90fb2aa0d5a371fd43f7">front</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the input converting any &#96;&#42;&#95;&#91;a-z&#93;&#96; snake case into &#96;&#42;&#91;A-Z&#93;&#96; camelCase.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> pos = 1, e = input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>(); pos &lt; e; ++pos) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (input&#91;pos&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;&#95;&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; pos != (e - 1) &amp;&amp; std::islower(input&#91;pos + 1&#93;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      output.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadcb10384f6f67a800d81e4312cabc46">llvm::toUpper</a>(input&#91;++pos&#93;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      output.push&#95;back(input&#91;pos&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> output;</span></CodeLine>
